segments.text: I notice the boy is really determined to get those cookies, even if it means risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, just waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised the woman hasn't heard the water overflowing, it must be making a lot of noise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, and I'm worried the boy might hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit angry that the woman isn't paying attention to what's going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is getting really wet, and it's just going to make a bigger mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the kids will get away with taking the cookies or if their mom will catch them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching his limits to reach that jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the girl doesn't try to climb up there too, it's dangerous enough with just one of them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is a mix of innocence and danger, and it's making me feel a bit anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would turn around and see what's happening before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
